00021 #pragma once
00022 
00023 #include <l4/cxx/std_alloc>
00024 #include <l4/cxx/list>
00025 #include <l4/sys/consts.h>
00026 
00027 namespace cxx {
00028 
00038 template< int Obj_size, int Slab_size = L4_PAGESIZE,
00039   int Max_free = 2, template<typename A> class Alloc = New_allocator >
00040 class Base_slab
00041 {
00042 private:
00043   struct Free_o
00044   {
00045     Free_o *next;
00046   };
00047 
00048 protected:
00049   struct Slab_i;
00050 
00051 private:
00052   struct Slab_head : public List_item
00053   {
00054     unsigned num_free;
00055     Free_o *free;
00056     Base_slab<Obj_size, Slab_size, Max_free, Alloc> *cache;
00057 
00058     inline Slab_head() throw() : num_free(0), free(0), cache(0) 
00059     {}
00060   };
00061 
00062 public:
00063   enum
00064   {
00065     object_size      = Obj_size,   
00066     slab_size        = Slab_size,  
00067 
00068     objects_per_slab = (Slab_size - sizeof(Slab_head)) / object_size,
00070     max_free_slabs   = Max_free,
00071   };
00072 
00073 protected:
00074   struct Slab_store
00075   { 
00076     char _o[slab_size - sizeof(Slab_head)]; 
00077     Free_o *object(unsigned obj) throw()
00078     { return reinterpret_cast<Free_o*>(_o + object_size * obj); }
00079   };
00080 
00081   struct Slab_i : public Slab_store, public Slab_head
00082   {};
00083   
00084 public:
00086   typedef Alloc<Slab_i> Slab_alloc;
00087 
00088   typedef void Obj_type;
00089 
00090 private:
00091   Slab_alloc _alloc;
00092   unsigned _num_free;
00093   unsigned _num_slabs;
00094   Slab_i *_full_slabs;
00095   Slab_i *_partial_slabs;
00096   Slab_i *_empty_slabs;
00097 
00099   void add_slab(Slab_i *s) throw()
00100   {
00101     s->num_free = objects_per_slab;
00102     s->cache = this;
00103 
00104     //L4::cerr << "Slab: " << this << "->add_slab(" << s << ", size=" 
00105     //  << slab_size << "):" << " f=" << s->object(0) << '\n';
00106 
00107     // initialize free list
00108     Free_o *f = s->free = s->object(0);
00109     for (unsigned i = 0; i < objects_per_slab; ++i)
00110       {
00111   f->next = s->object(i);
00112   f = f->next;
00113       }
00114     f->next = 0;
00115 
00116     // insert slab into cache's list
00117     _empty_slabs = List_item::push_front(_empty_slabs, s);
00118     ++_num_slabs;
00119     ++_num_free;
00120   }
00121 
00123   bool grow() throw()
00124   {
00125     Slab_i *s = _alloc.alloc();
00126     if (!s)
00127       return false;
00128 
00129     new (s, cxx::Nothrow()) Slab_i();
00130 
00131     add_slab(s);
00132     return true;
00133   }
00134 
00136   void shrink() throw()
00137   {
00138     if (!_alloc.can_free)
00139       return;
00140 
00141     while (_empty_slabs && _num_free > max_free_slabs)
00142       {
00143   Slab_i *s = _empty_slabs;
00144   _empty_slabs = List_item::remove(_empty_slabs, s);
00145   --_num_free;
00146   --_num_slabs;
00147   _alloc.free(s);
00148       }
00149   }
00150 
00151 public:
00152   Base_slab(Slab_alloc const &alloc = Slab_alloc()) throw()
00153     : _alloc(alloc), _num_free(0), _num_slabs(0), _full_slabs(0), 
00154       _partial_slabs(0), _empty_slabs(0)
00155   {}
00156 
00157   ~Base_slab() throw()
00158   {
00159     while (_empty_slabs)
00160       {
00161   Slab_i *o = _empty_slabs;
00162   _empty_slabs = List_item::remove(_empty_slabs, o);
00163   _alloc.free(o);
00164       }
00165     while (_partial_slabs)
00166       {
00167   Slab_i *o = _partial_slabs;
00168   _partial_slabs = List_item::remove(_partial_slabs, o);
00169   _alloc.free(o);
00170       }
00171     while (_full_slabs)
00172       {
00173   Slab_i *o = _full_slabs;
00174   _full_slabs = List_item::remove(_full_slabs, o);
00175   _alloc.free(o);
00176       }
00177   }
00178 
00179   void *alloc() throw()
00180   {
00181     Slab_i **free = &_partial_slabs;
00182     if (!(*free))
00183       free = &_empty_slabs;
00184 
00185     if (!(*free) && !grow())
00186       return 0;
00187 
00188     Slab_i *s = *free;
00189     Free_o *o = s->free;
00190     s->free = o->next;
00191 
00192     if (free == &_empty_slabs)
00193       {
00194   _empty_slabs = List_item::remove(_empty_slabs, s);
00195         --_num_free;
00196       }
00197 
00198     --(s->num_free);
00199 
00200     if (!s->free)
00201       {
00202   _partial_slabs = List_item::remove(_partial_slabs, s);
00203         _full_slabs = List_item::push_front(_full_slabs, s);
00204       }
00205     else if (free == &_empty_slabs)
00206       _partial_slabs = List_item::push_front(_partial_slabs, s);
00207 
00208     //L4::cerr << this << "->alloc(): " << o << ", of " << s << '\n';
00209 
00210     return o;
00211   }
00212 
00213   void free(void *_o) throw()
00214   {
00215     if (!_o)
00216       return;
00217 
00218     unsigned long addr = (unsigned long)_o;
00219     addr = (addr / slab_size) * slab_size;
00220     Slab_i *s = (Slab_i*)addr;
00221 
00222     if (s->cache != this)
00223       return;
00224 
00225     Free_o *o = reinterpret_cast<Free_o*>(_o);
00226 
00227     o->next = s->free;
00228     s->free = o;
00229 
00230     bool was_full = false;
00231 
00232     if (!s->num_free)
00233       {
00234   _full_slabs = List_item::remove(_full_slabs, s);
00235   was_full = true;
00236       }
00237 
00238     ++(s->num_free);
00239 
00240     if (s->num_free == objects_per_slab)
00241       {
00242   if (!was_full)
00243     _partial_slabs = List_item::remove(_partial_slabs, s);
00244 
00245   _empty_slabs = List_item::push_front(_empty_slabs, s);
00246   ++_num_free;
00247   if (_num_free > max_free_slabs)
00248     shrink();
00249 
00250   was_full = false;
00251       }
00252 
00253     if (was_full) 
00254       _partial_slabs = List_item::push_front(_partial_slabs, s);
00255 
00256     //L4::cerr << this << "->free(" << _o << "): of " << s << '\n';
00257   }
00258 
00264   unsigned total_objects() const throw()
00265   { return _num_slabs * objects_per_slab; }
00266 
00272   unsigned free_objects() const throw()
00273   {
00274     unsigned count = 0;
00275 
00276     /* count partial slabs first */
00277     List_item::T_iter<Slab_i> s = _partial_slabs;
00278     while (*s)
00279       {
00280         count += s->num_free;
00281         s++;
00282       }
00283 
00284     /* add empty slabs */
00285     count += _num_free * objects_per_slab;
00286 
00287     return count;
00288   }
00289 };
00290 
00299 template<typename Type, int Slab_size = L4_PAGESIZE,
00300   int Max_free = 2, template<typename A> class Alloc = New_allocator > 
00301 class Slab : public Base_slab<sizeof(Type), Slab_size, Max_free, Alloc>
00302 {
00303 private:
00304   typedef Base_slab<sizeof(Type), Slab_size, Max_free, Alloc> Base_type;
00305 public:
00306 
00307   typedef Type Obj_type;
00308 
00309   Slab(typename Base_type::Slab_alloc const &alloc 
00310       = typename Base_type::Slab_alloc()) throw()
00311     : Base_slab<sizeof(Type), Slab_size, Max_free, Alloc>(alloc) {}
00312 
00313 
00318   Type *alloc() throw()
00319   { 
00320     return (Type*)Base_slab<sizeof(Type), Slab_size,
00321       Max_free, Alloc>::alloc(); 
00322   }
00323 
00329   void free(Type *o) throw()
00330   { Base_slab<sizeof(Type), Slab_size, Max_free, Alloc>::free(o); }
00331 };
00332 
00333 
00350 template< int Obj_size, int Slab_size = L4_PAGESIZE,
00351   int Max_free = 2, template<typename A> class Alloc = New_allocator >
00352 class Base_slab_static
00353 {
00354 private:
00355   typedef Base_slab<Obj_size, Slab_size, Max_free, Alloc> _A;
00356   static _A _a;
00357 public:
00358   typedef void Obj_type;
00359   enum
00360   {
00361     object_size      = Obj_size,  
00362     slab_size        = Slab_size, 
00363 
00364     objects_per_slab = _A::objects_per_slab,
00365     max_free_slabs   = Max_free,  
00366   };
00367 
00369   void *alloc() throw() { return _a.alloc(); }
00375   void free(void *p) throw() { _a.free(p); }
00376 
00384   unsigned total_objects() const throw() { return _a.total_objects(); }
00385 
00393   unsigned free_objects() const throw() { return _a.free_objects(); }
00394 };
00395 
00396 
00397 template< int _O, int _S, int _M, template<typename A> class Alloc >
00398 typename Base_slab_static<_O,_S,_M,Alloc>::_A 
00399   Base_slab_static<_O,_S,_M,Alloc>::_a; 
00400 
00417 template<typename Type, int Slab_size = L4_PAGESIZE,
00418   int Max_free = 2, template<typename A> class Alloc = New_allocator > 
00419 class Slab_static 
00420 : public Base_slab_static<sizeof(Type), Slab_size, Max_free, Alloc>
00421 {
00422 public:
00423 
00424   typedef Type Obj_type;
00429   Type *alloc() throw()
00430   { 
00431     return (Type*)Base_slab_static<sizeof(Type), Slab_size,
00432       Max_free, Alloc>::alloc(); 
00433   }
00434 };
00435 
00436 }
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
